Class SelectMultiPointsActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Activity
      • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
        • android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
          • pylapp.smoothclicker.android.views.TranslucentActivity

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class SelectMultiPointsActivity
extends TranslucentActivity
    A translucent activity to help the user to click on a point on its screen over another app for example. To use it:
    Since:
    17/03/2016
    Version:
    1.3.0
    Author:
    pylapp

    • Field Detail

      • mXYCoordinates

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> mXYCoordinates
        The list of coordinates of points to click on. The list contains each X and Y value as follows: 
                 { x0, y 0, x1, y1, ..., xN, yN}

        private void showInSnackbarWithoutAction(java.lang.String message)
        Displays in the snack bar a message
        Parameters:
        message - - The string to display. Will do nothing if null or empty

      • showInSnackbarWithDismissAction

        private void showInSnackbarWithDismissAction(java.lang.String message)
        Displays in the snack bar a message with a dismiss action. If the user click on the dismiss action, its selected point will be removed
        Parameters:
        message - - The string to display. Will do nothing if null or empty

      • removeLastPoint

        private void removeLastPoint()
        Removes form the list of coordinates the last point, i.e. the two last items
